DataElement.preferredName: Package Product Material Substance State Code ISO21090.CD.v1.0
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A container within which the product is delivered or shipped. EXAMPLE(S): a shipping carton, bottle A coded value specifying the state and nature of the material. EXAMPLE(S): solid, liquid, gas, tablet, ointment, gel.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Package Product Material Substance State Code
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A product container with any accompanying materials or components.:The end result of a manufacturing process; anything that is produced.:The tangible substance that goes into the makeup of a physical object._A material with particular features.:The way something is with respect to its main attributes.:A symbol or combination of symbols which is given an arbitrary meaning within a systematized collection of concepts used for data representation.

Concepts.definition: Any matter of defined composition that has discrete existence, whose origin may be biological, mineral or chemical.
The way something is with respect to its main attributes.
